item.title: Autokeys
item.description: Edit(3/7/2021): The solutions discussed in the post are ill-formed and obsolete, and were crafted under the influence of staying up past my bedtime and using manpages as late-night reading material. A new post with more manageable solutions to this problem is coming soon While setting up a development environment on my newest computer, I realized that my ssh key management situation has become untenable. I now have three development machines: a desktop, a Surface Pro 5, and a mid-2012 Macbook Pro.
